subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/train-hey-dumb-fuck-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Got this on June 7th at a creek with 2 train trussels and a bridge that pass over it. Kids hang out around the water in summer. Was a misty-rainy day when I recorded. No kids have been out yet.....school just recently out. I hear a train off in distance from another location, I repeat that I hear a train into the recorder. Then a "smart mouthed" young teenager says a cuss word (is in title)  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/train-hey-dumb-fuck-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
